head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STEUERMAN, IRA AND SUSAN (NEE GOLDSTEIN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STEUERMAN, IRA AND SUSAN (NEE GOLDSTEIN)

block.p: STEUERMAN--Ira and Susan (nee Goldstein) passed away on Saturday March 31, 2007 in a tragic car accident. Survived by son Douglas (Erika) Steuerman, daughter Melissa Steuerman, grandchildren Ryan and Isabelle, Brother Dennis (Rayna) Stone and mother Ellen. Funeral Services will be held Friday at 9:30am at Francisco Funeral Home, 102-17 101st Avenue, Ozone Park, New York.
